reviews.review: this is one of the best games about quantum tunneling i've Ever played. the first game was good but this game takes everything good about that first game and improves it. this game is so good you've probably played it before and if you haven't, you should. i own like three copies of it! i would probably buy a forth copy! its a very good game.
It's a great puzzle game that makes you think hard. Not only can you spend hours upon hours on the campaign and co-op, you can also download rooms from other players of the game. 10/10 -me
Great to play with friends late at night, worth the money and super cheap! Only thing is i wish there was more levels. But good enough for 7-16 hours of gameplay.

Amazing game! Great sequel to a game I didn't think needed one, and in my opinion is even better than the first. The story is amazing, with good puzzles that need much thinking, and the characters are absolutely loveable. It has a mix of elements from the first along with new elements, but the new ones are introduced easily, and are able to be caught on quick. Would recommend!
